name: Vintage Lather Backpack: Handmade in Greece
description:
Handmade over 20 years ago in Greece, this beautifully worn leather backpack is constructed with strong, durable, buttery-brown leather. Equipped with five pockets — three small buckle pockets on the front, a zipper pocket on the back, and a quick release buckle & drawstring for the main compartment — this piece is ready to be packed and ready to go. Variations in the leather color can be found on the base & back (see photos) adding to the already worn in aesthetic.

FOUND
Back in 2010 while visiting a friend in Brooklyn, New York.

SIZE
Approx. 15" tall x 13" wide x 9" front to back

WEAR
This piece is slightly irregular as it is vintage adding character and ensuring its unique quality. Some materials are distressed — care should be taken when cleaned to ensure this piece it is not harmed.

description:

Inherited from long-time family travel friends in Annandale, VA. Summer 2009.

Medium.

WEAR
This piece is slightly irregular as it is vintage adding character and ensuring its unique quality. Some materials are distressed — care should be taken when cleaned to ensure this piece it is not harmed.

This piece is slightly irregular as it is handmade adding character and ensuring its unique quality. Some materials used are inherently fragile — care should be taken to ensure this piece it is not struck with hard objects or surfaces during wear.

**MADE BY FOUND CO**

name: Hammered Out Hoop Earrings
description:
Minimal gold wire hoop earrings, hammered and molded. 

FOUND
Wire found while home on winter break from college deep within in my Mom's craft closet. Winter 2009.

SIZE
1.25" diameter. Additional sizes made upon request. 

**MADE BY FOUND CO**

name: Floral Tiger Head Necklace
description:
VINTAGE
A vintage statement piece. The centerpiece presents the illusion of a lion head while close-up actually made up of floral detailing. 

FOUND
In Falls Church, Virginia while on a Sunday hunt for new vintage wear. Summer 2011.

SIZE
Chain, 24" around. Pendant, 3.5" tall x 3.5" wide.

name: Pharaoh Plate Necklace
description:
VINTAGE
The detailed gold plate lies between a variety of beads, gold and clay, that make up the chain. 

FOUND
Howes Street thrift shop, Fort Collins, CO. Spring 2013.

SIZE
Chain, 14" around. Pendant, 2.5" wide x 1.25" tall.

name: Turquoise on Wood Headress Bolo
description:
VINTAGE
Turquoise is set into wood on the lacquered ornament creating an abstract image of a womans face with a cloth headress. This ornament sits in braided black leather with Sterling Silver tips. 

FOUND
While sifting through bins of jewelry at the local Goodwill, this piece sat tangled, tarnished and undeservingly forgotten. This piece has since been cleaned & cared for and is ready for its debut. Fort Collins, CO // summer 2013.

SIZE
Leather strap, 32" around. Ornament, 1.5" wide x 2" tall.

name: Tribal Onyx Fringe Earrings
description:
VINTAGE
Fringe rows are created from strips of sterling silver, individually formed into a stretched droplet shapes, gradually varying in length. These pieces hang freely below a large droplet shaped piece of marbleized onyx. 

FOUND
During a trip to Santiago, Chile, I was on my way into the mountains, destined for a parasailing flight, when I stopped to see an elderly woman who had a great little roadside antique good shop where these were sitting just as I walked in the door. Winter 2009.

SIZE
Each 3" long x 1" wide.

name: Spike Sea Stone Necklace
description:
A white, river washed stone and green, ocean washed piece of seaglass have been set into hammered wire and hung by leather cord, natural in color and adjustable by sliding knots. 

FOUND
Stone was found in the Forehole River of Yellowstone NP. Seaglass was found just north of Rehoboth Beach coastline in Cape Henlopen Park, DE. Summer '12 & '13. 

SIZE
27" around & adjustable. Hemp is tied to a sliding knot closure which allows adjustment of length to your preference. Pendant, 5" tall x 3" wide.

WEAR
This piece is slightly irregular as it is handmade adding character and ensuring its unique quality. Some materials used are inherently fragile — care should be taken to ensure this piece it is not struck with hard objects or surfaces during wear.

**MADE BY FOUND CO**

name: Brass Pennant Earrings
description:
Recycled brass sheets have been cleaned while retaining their original characteristic impressions. Both pieces have been cut into small pennants and hooked onto 22ga gold-filled wire.

FOUND
Recycled brass sheets were found at Resource near old town Fort Collins, CO, likely pulled from and old residential construction site. Summer 2013. 

SIZE
3" tall x 1.25" wide. Pennants, .75" tall x .5" wide. 

WEAR
This piece is slightly irregular as it is handmade adding character and ensuring its unique quality. Some materials used are inherently fragile — care should be taken to ensure this piece it is not struck with hard objects or surfaces during wear.

**MADE BY FOUND CO**

name: Burn Mark Necklace
description:
The front face of this stone has a unique burnt orange round formation contrasting in color and texture to the off-white base stone. This stone is set into a folded metal sheet and hung by leather cord, natural in color and adjustable by a sliding knot. 

FOUND
While floating down the Firehole River in Yellowstone NP, this stone laid no more than a foot below the currents surface. Mistaking this for two stones at first, upon emerging I was faced with a welcome surprise. Summer 2013. 

SIZE
26" around & adjustable. Hemp is tied to a sliding knot closure which allows adjustment of length to your preference. Pendant, 1.25" wide x 1.5" tall. 

WEAR
This piece is slightly irregular as it is handmade adding character and ensuring its unique quality. Some materials used are inherently fragile — care should be taken to ensure this piece it is not struck with hard objects or surfaces during wear.

**MADE BY FOUND CO**

name: Crystal Power Necklace
description:
Quartz crystal is set in an empty bullet casing and hung by leather cord, natural in color and adjustable by sliding knots. 

FOUND
This bullet casing was given to me by a good friend & Iraq war veteran. Summer 2013.

SIZE
27" around & adjustable. Hemp is tied to a sliding knot closure which allows adjustment of length to your preference. Pendant, 3.25" tall x .5" wide. 

WEAR
This piece is slightly irregular as it is handmade adding character and ensuring its unique quality. Some materials used are inherently fragile — care should be taken to ensure this piece it is not struck with hard objects or surfaces during wear.

**MADE BY FOUND CO**

name: Native Pocket Necklace
description:
VINTAGE
Similar to a locket this pendant is formed such as a pocket, hollowed out with an opening on the top, while the chain is composed of seafoam colored beads and coiled wire. 

FOUND
Flamingo Boutique, Fort Collins, CO. Fall 2013.

SIZE
18" around.
